title: Which of the following is true about CodeIgniter?
output: CodeIgniter is an application development framework, which can be used to develop websites, using PHP. It is an Open Source framework. It has a very rich set of functionality, which will increase the speed of website development work.

options.a: CodeIgniter is an application development framework
options.b: CodeIgniter can be used to develop websites, using PHP.
options.c: CodeIgniter is an Open Source framework

title: CodeIgniter directory structure is divided into?
output: CodeIgniter directory structure is divided into 3 folders : Application, System, User_guide.

title: The __________ serves as an intermediary between the Model, the View, and any other resources needed to process the HTTP request and generate a web page.
output: The Controller serves as an intermediary between the Model, the View, and any other resources needed to process the HTTP request and generate a web page.

title: Model classes are stored in __________ directory.
output: Model classes are stored in application/models directory

title: In Routing, which segment represents the controller class that should be invoked?
output:
The first segment represents the controller class that should be invoked.
The second segment represents the class function, or method, that should be called.
The third, and any additional segments, represent the ID and any variables that will be passed to the controller.
